Name: 幻梦之城(C T O D)
About the game: This is an alternative game of tower defense combined with horizontal board action Elemental magic In the game, you can use the mouse pointer to build three magic elements in the lower left corner of the game interface (within the specified grid range) You can also use the mouse pointer again to move to the magical element you built and click to upgrade the attribute!!! 1. Fire element Upgrade position 1: increased attack power (level 20 in total) Upgrade position 2: attack speed (Level 5 in total) Upgrade position 3: range range (3 levels in total) Upgrade position 4: fire element stunt (Level 3 in total) Features: lock an enemy within the attack range for single attack. With high range and attack power, you can only attack one enemy 2. Water element Upgrade position 1: deceleration force increase (5 levels in total) Upgrade position 2: deceleration range (3 levels in total) Upgrade position 3: water element stunt (Level 3 in total) Features: within the attack range, decelerate the movement speed of all enemies by 15% - 25%, but there is no material damage 3. Thunder element Upgrade position 1: increased attack power (level 20 in total) Upgrade position 2: attack speed (Level 5 in total) Upgrade position 3: Thunder element stunt (Level 3 in total) Features: in the attack range, attack all enemies, low range and low attack power. Tip: once built, it cannot be destroyed. Please use tactics reasonably!!! hero 1. You can use the (w s a d) keyboard keys to move heroes.press the key continuously to run,Remember not to collide with enemy units, otherwise you will die immediately. 2. After each death, there is a 5-second countdown to resurrection. During resurrection, there is an invincible time of 5 seconds. Please use it reasonably!! 3. Each death will reduce HP, or the enemy will also reduce HP through our camp. When HP is 0, the game will fail and experience it by yourself!!! 4. In terms of character skills, (k or L) Jian keeps pressing until the power storage bar is full. Release the button to release the skills. The functions of each skill are different. Please experience the rational use by yourself!!! 5. After each skill is released, there is a corresponding cooling time!!!!! If you encounter a plot dialogue in the game, please press enter to go to the next step!!!! Don't hesitate, don't linger, join this summit duel！！！
